General.Name: Alm. Brand
General.Description: Alm. Brand A/S, together with its subsidiaries, provides non-life insurance products and services in Denmark. The company offers its non-life insurance products, such as health and accident, workers' compensation, liability, vehicle, fire and property, marine, aviation and transport, and other insurance products to private households, agricultural, and commercial customers through its sales channels and partnerships. The company was founded in 1792 and is headquartered in Copenhagen, Denmark.
